## RedemptionDetails.actual1USDAmount property

Amount of 1USD that was actually redeemed by the transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
actual1USDAmount: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

This can end up being lower than `attempted1USDAmount` due to interference from another transaction that modifies the list of Troves.
